channel.title: keratoconus on Keratoconus
channel.description: Recent content in keratoconus on Keratoconus

item.title: Scleral lenses a final solution for keratoconus?
item.description: Scleral Lenses The keratoconus advanced patient has a great option called Scleral lenses; they help people that have become intolerant to other corneal lenses.

item.title: What is Corneal Collagen Crosslinking?
item.description: Corneal Collagen Cross-Linking Corneal collagen crosslinking is a photo-chemical procedure to make your cornea stiffer by bonding the collagen fibers with riboflavin and ultraviolet light, suggested by Switzerland professor Theo Seiler, MD.

item.title: Do you have keratoconus?
item.description: Do you have keratoconus? The first time you realize you have visual problems is at school, you just can’t see clearly from behind the classroom, so you have to sit closer to the blackboard.
